block.p: FORMAN-Zena, age 93. Beloved wife of the late Harry A. Beloved mother of Leon and Edith Forman and Bernice and the late Lewis Friedman. Loving grandmother of Jody and Michael Ramsey, Marcus and Michael, great-grandmother of Joshua and Caitlin. Service 12 noon, Tuesday, Plaza Memorial, 91st Street and Amsterdam Avenue. No Shiva.

FORMAN-Zena. The Trustees, officers and staff of The Educational Alliance, mourn the passing of Zena Forman, beloved mother of Bernice Friedman, former Trustee and Vice President of the Board. We extend our heartfelt condolences to Bernice and to the Forman family.

FORMAN-Zena. The Trustees, officers and staff of The Educational Alliance, mourn the passing of Zena Forman, beloved mother of Bernice Friedman, former Trustee and Vice President of the Board. We extend our heartfelt condolences to Bernice and to the Forman family.
